tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SoilCompositionData (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    nutrient_type VARCHAR(50),
    nutrient_level FLOAT,
    soil_ph FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE SoilSamples (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	sample_date DATE,
	location VARCHAR(255),
	nitrogen_level FLOAT,
	phosphorus_level FLOAT,
	potassium_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE NutrientLevels (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	sample_id INT,
	nutrient_name VARCHAR(255),
	value FLOAT,
	unit VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE soil_samples (
    sample_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    date_collected DATE,
    pH DECIMAL,
    nutrient_levels JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE nutrient_analysis (
    analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT REFERENCES soil_samples(sample_id),
    nitrate DECIMAL,
    phosphate DECIMAL,
    potassium DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE soil_trends (
    trend_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    trend_description TEXT,
    trend_start_date DATE,
    trend_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE SoilSamples (sample_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  date_sampled DATE,
  ph_level DECIMAL,
  nitrogen_level DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE NutrientLevels (reading_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT,
  phosphorus DECIMAL,
  potassium DECIMAL,
  magnesium DECIMAL,
  calcium DECIMAL,
  iron DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE SoilHealth (health_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT,
  organic_matter DECIMAL,
  microbial_activity DECIMAL,
  compaction DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE WeatherConditions (day_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  temperature DECIMAL,
  humidity DECIMAL,
  precipitation DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE SoilComposition (composition_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT,
  sand_percent DECIMAL,
  silt_percent DECIMAL,
  clay_percent DECIMAL);
